constituent: chain, metal, gold, small, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisigStory: Metal . . . little . . . shells. We have saved this character until no win order to draw attention to the visual difference between the owl and little. By now your eyes should be so accustomed to these apparently infinitesimal differences that the point is obvious.
koohiiStory1: The chain on this chainsaw is made of little metal shells.
koohiiStory2: A gold chain with small seashells hanging on it is in fashion these days.

封鎖(ふうさ): blockade, freezing (funds)
